Welcome to Special Education Info Packet

div.div: The Food Service Department of Fairview School District is providing free lunch to students and siblings under age 18 in our district during our school closure. Click the link below to read more and access the order form.

The Fairview School District is committed to providing students with a quality and equitable educational experience during the school closure. The Continuity of Education Plan is established to identify what teaching and learning will look like in the district. The plan outlines the procedures for Planned Instruction in an online and remote format across all grade levels and student populations.
div.a: Read More about FSD Continuity of Education Plan

a.title: New Student Online Enrollment for Fall 2020 is Now Open!

div.a: New Student Online Enrollment for Fall 2020 is Now Open!
div.div: Fairview School District's online enrollment for the 2020-2021 school year is now open. Read on to access the enrollment form. *Please note that this process is only for new kindergarten students and students transferring from other schools. Nothing needs to be submitted for current students at this time.*
div.a: Read More about New Student Online Enrollment for Fall 2020 is Now Open!
